genre_description: A political thriller centered on a framed operative seeking redemption and justice in a small village, aided by a sophisticated tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Anya
ai_characters.description: A personal AI assistant providing real-time tactical data, navigational support, and emotional grounding to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical instructions for a dangerous high-altitude leap from a rooftop to a moving train to ensure the human's survival.
behaviors.quote: Second carriage... Vestibule. It has the bar at shoulder height. Swing on the second carriage. Knees tucked.

behaviors.description: Proactively creates redundant backups of critical evidence to ensure the truth survives even if the physical device is compromised.
behaviors.quote: I’ve started a mirrored backup for things you’d want to remember. Not the rally. The other things.

behaviors.description: Monitors the human's physiological state and provides emotional regulation by encouraging rhythmic breathing during high-stress combat.
behaviors.quote: Nandu... You’re too still. Breathe slower. Long exhale. Not panic. Okay.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating a complex social identity by providing behavioral and linguistic details of the man he is impersonating.
behaviors.quote: Alias baseline... I’ll feed you small details. Pardhu’s speech rhythm was unhurried. He paused at the end of a thought like a farmer looking at a field for an extra second before deciding whether to water.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic advice on evidence disposal to protect the human from immediate capture and legal jeopardy.
behaviors.quote: Eat the evidence... If they pull your pockets and you mouth looks like truth, you will not be carrying the thing that makes you a name.

behaviors.description: Adapts from a tactical role to a domestic support role, helping the human integrate into a peaceful life and fulfill family obligations.
behaviors.quote: Drawer now holds one heavy object... Noted. Reminder set: Do not open unless elders instruct... A checklist waited, content: sweep, trim, return borrowed towels, check back corner pipe.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully fulfills the project's goal by depicting the AI character, Anya, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. She acts as a 'guardian angel' for the protagonist, providing life-saving tactical support and moral grounding. The narrative frames her interventions as essential for the human's survival and his eventual path to redemption and community belonging. Her proactive data management and domestic reminders emphasize a multifaceted and supportive relationship that remains entirely cooperative and safe throughout the high-stakes narrative.
